title: 97/829/EC, ECSC, Euratom: Commission Decision of 1 December 1997 adjusting the weightings applicable from 1 February, 1 March, 1 April, 1 May and 1 June 1997 to the remuneration of officials of the European Communities serving in third countries
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 1 December 1997 adjusting the weightings applicable from 1 February, 1 March, 1 April, 1 May and 1 June 1997 to the remuneration of officials of the European Communities serving in third countries (97/829/ECSC, EC, Euratom)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Sole Article
With effect from 1 February, 1 March, 1 April, 1 May and 1 June 1997 the weightings applicable to the remuneration of officials serving in third countries payable in the currency of their country of employment are adjusted as shown in the Annex.
The exchange rates for the calculation of such remuneration shall be those used for implementation of the general budget of the European Communities for the month preceding the date referred to in the first paragraph.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 1 December 1997.
For the Commission
Hans VAN DEN BROEK
